data.title: Dive into anything
data.text:
Pre cable, we got the big 3 channels, and, when the weather was good and we got the antenna in just the right position, we could tune in that UHF independent channel, which was great because that is where all of the afternoon cartoons were. Was anybody stuck with the basic 3? How bad of a reception were you willing to deal with to watch bugs bunny?

Edit: not sure how I could forget it, but we also had that commercial free channel that showed Mr Rogers and dry British sitcoms. And if you sent them $15, they sent you a tote bag.
